item.title: Introduction
Flow Control
item.description: Just writing normally as well. Condition if day == "sunday" || day == "saturday" { rest() } else if day == "monday" && isTired() { groan() } else { work() } if _, err := doThing(); err != nil { fmt.Println("Uh oh") Switch switch day { case "sunday": // cases don't "fall through" by default! fallthrough case "saturday": rest() default: work() } Loop for count := 0; count <= 10; count++ { fmt.
